title: Verify that the tenant listed in staged_config.json uses sidecarsvc to sign onprem ca
custom_steps:
1. Update the staged_config.json with tenant 6550
2. Pre-sign happens without triggering manually or file change 
2. Configure onprem signing ca
3. Check that the signing happens using sidecar svc for tenant 6550
4. Check the ECA is present in sidecarsvc using the api call
sudo curl -v -X GET --unix-socket /var/run/proxysidecar.socket -H "x-netskope-tenantid:6690" http://xxx/v1/cert/inlineca
custom_expected: Sidecarsvc is used to configure onprem ca
